en.title: Slow Wave Residency
en.label: Film & site · 2024
en.summary: Short film, landing page, and generative visuals for an artist-in-residence programme celebrating rest and ritual.
en.description:
Slow Wave Residency focused on rest and ritual. Our team filmed on location in the forest using Super 8 and 6K digital footage, then restored selected reels with AI colour to preserve the nostalgic mood.

The landing page weaves film clips, photography, and participant quotes into a single scroll narrative. I also embedded generative backgrounds that emit soft glows at night to mirror the residency's quiet tempo.
highlights: Super 8 scans enhanced with AI colour to retain vintage character
Single-page story built with Astro for performance
Delivered print-ready posters and subtitle templates for the event

zh.title: Slow Wave Residency
zh.label: 影片與網站 · 2024
zh.summary: 為藝術駐村計畫製作短片、網站與生成視覺，歌頌休息與儀式。
zh.role: 影像導演 · 後製 · 登陸頁
zh.description:
Slow Wave Residency 的策展主題是「慢波」，強調休息與儀式性的創作節奏。我與團隊到森林中駐地拍攝，使用 Super 8 與數位 6K 混合，並以 AI 上色技術修復部份膠片。

Landing Page 採用單頁敘事，將影片片段、攝影照片與參與者文字交錯呈現；同時嵌入生成式背景，使頁面在夜間出現微光閃動的效果。
highlights: Super 8 膠片掃描與 AI 上色，建構懷舊質感
Landing page 以 Astro 建置，確保讀取效率
提供活動現場的可輸出海報與字幕模版
